item.description: Crafting cutting-edge features for a next gen data analytics plateform

item.description: Designing a complex dApp with web3 constrains used by Swapbox operators to manage their Swapbox fleet.

item.title: Designing the user interface for Swapbox
item.description: Setting a new standard for the user experience and interface of crypto ATMs, focusing on emerging economies.

item.title: Enabling purchases of Bitcoin notes physically
item.description: Bitcoin notes are a novel and secure way to hold Bitcoin. Why not make the experience even better by acquiring them in person?
